item.title: Angry Meteor
item.description: AngryMeteor AngryMeteor is a hypercasual game, where you need to save your planet from a meteor shower. Link Check the game here! Game Demo Developer Raj Pathare Platforms Android (v4.1+) PC Graphics/Textures The game graphics are specially designed for mobile users. The textures are chosen in such a way that the users may not experience any lag while playing the game. Future work To add more features in the game like - powerups, adding more custom levels.
